detail_desc: Gloves in soft, supple leather with a zip at the top. Lined.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a sheen. Drawstring and gathers in the side seams for best fit.

Zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Hat in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ears and an embroidered motif on the front.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.

Set in soft organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved, patterned bodysuit with decorative buttons at the top and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim legs.
Ankle boots with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the back, faux fur linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) soles.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a gentle V-neck and narrow shoulder straps with decorative tie details at the top.
Short dress in lace with a V-neck front and back, and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared, voluminous skirt. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the top, long sleeves and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Sleeveless top in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons on one shoulder, 3/4-length sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section over the foot and slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum fit. Reinforced heel and toe for perfect, friction-free comfort.

Short dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and large kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders and long, voluminous sleeves with ribbed cuffs. The polyester content of the dress in recycled.
Rings in various designs. Two smooth and eight with various decorations.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Bucket hat in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Metal eyelets at each side and a sweatband.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length dress in a viscose twill weave with a collar and concealed tab with a button and a concealed zip at the top. 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Sun hat in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a brim at the front, covered elastication and a decorative bow at the back, and ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.

Lined, bandeau bikini top with side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in satin with a draped neckline at the front and a concealed zip at the back of the neck.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and side pockets. Lined.
Windbreaker in rustly nylon with a drawstring hood and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, side pockets, and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined bandeau bikini top in soft fabric made from an Econyl® and recycled polyester blend. Side support, a silicone trim at the top and hem, and ties at the back. Econyl® is nylon made from recycled fibres from fishing nets and other nylon waste, reducing impact on the climate and contributing to cleaner oceans.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a picot trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a turned-up hem.
Slip-on cotton canvas trainers with a padded top edge, elastic gores in the sides and raised text along the soles. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Straight-cut, wide top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and slits in the sides.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in a lightweight, patterned weave with a small, frilled stand-up collar with a V-shaped opening at the front. Long sleeves with a decorative frill along the shoulder seams and narrow elastication at the cuffs with a frill trim. Unlined.
Jacket in a block-coloured weave with a zip down the front and stand-up collar with a contrasting colour lining. Zipped side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Mesh lining.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, pleat at the back and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Small, heart-shaped bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable waist belt with a metal buckle. Size 3x11.8x15.3 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft, fine cotton blend with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Short, A-line skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Jersey lining.
Tie-hem top in cotton jersey with a motif.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Matching pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Metal hair clips. Four with a sewn-on bow, two glittery. Length 5 cm.
Hat in braided straw with an imitation leather band. Width of brim 7 cm.
Long-sleeved top in stretch viscose jersey with a wide neckline and rounded hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Leggings in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details with patches on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Top in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative tie detail at the top. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a gathered V-neck, pleat at the front, slit at the cuffs, and rounded hem.

Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a rounded hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.

Lined bandeau bikini top with flounces at the top, lightly padded cups, detachable shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck, and a fastener at the back. Concealed silicone trim at the top of the back, and side support.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey containing some silk.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short shorts in a soft weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Partially concealed fabric belt with a metal square ring buckle at the front, side pockets, welt back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Large scarf in a soft, checked weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 65x200 cm.
Polo-neck top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves. Slim Fit.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side and back pockets. Legs with decorative stitching, quilted sections and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a lace-trimmed seam at the shoulders and an open section at the front with a tie at the neck. Double-layered bodice, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a small frill trim, a concealed zip in one side, a lace-trimmed seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Short jersey underskirt.
Ribbed vest top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes and an overlocked hem.
Trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.

Shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Knee-length dress in soft denim with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets and a rounded hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in an airy weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons at the top. Draped cap sleeves, covered elastication at the back, and sewn-in ties at the sides. Lined.
Boots in imitation suede with an ankle-height shaft with a padded top edge, loop at the back and lacing with speed hooks at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fine-knit hat in soft cotton with a sequined motif and a ribbed hem.
Short, fitted one-shoulder dress in soft jersey with one long sleeve.
Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Cotton twill trousers with a button fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Regular fit.
